mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_num) values(#{member.id}, #{member.pw}, #{member.name}, #{member.num})
mapper.delete: delete from member where me_id = #{member.id} and me_pw = #{member.pw};
delete from member where me_id = #{member.id} and me_id != "admin"
mapper.select: select * from member order by me_id
